1.metaDescription: Premium facial,threading and bleach service right at your doorstep
1.metaKeyword: salon at home, facial,waxing at home
1.captionHeading: For best impression at first sight
1.caption: Add gleam to your face with skilled threading ,facial,bleach
1.serviceDescription: <p>Its true that facial skin is different from other body skin and requires utter care. you should employ facial and bleach under expert care to keep it young and scintillating, facial not only cleans, exfoliates and nourishes the skin, but also makes the complexion well-hydrated to make the skin look younger. while bleach can lighten up their skin that have been affected by discolouration and pigmentation issues.</p><p>Lookplex professionals understand the quirks of all sort of your skin and take extra care in handling the same. With a Lookplex professional, a facial beauty begins with a consultation like asking questions about your skin concerns, diet, your water intake etc. These can affect your skin and what kind of treatments she recommends. </p><p>After wrapping your hair with a towel or headband, the professional begins the facial with a thorough cleansing, using cotton pads. Unlike others, we relax your face to soften up any blackheads and whiteheads to be extracted. This is followed by a facial mask and then advice on home skin care.</p><p>Although it varies from person to person, one should get a facial done once a month. Moreover, whenever there is a season change, it is recommended that you go for a facial.</p>

3.metaDescription: Skilled Hair experts at your doorstep.
3.metaKeyword: hair spa and salon at home
3.captionHeading: Let you Hair style and color define you
3.caption: Hair spa to boost your hair health
3.serviceDescription: <p>Have you tried all sort of shampoos and hair oil with no aid to hair fall and split ends?Then, Hair spa is likely your solution, it not only strengthen your hairs from root but  also solves problems like dandruff, hair loss, rough and dull hair. Hair spa helps in conditioning the scalp, circulates blood, gives relaxation and makes hair follicles stronger.It re-hydrates the scalp  and prevent excessive oil secretion.</p><p>We have highly experienced pool of hair experts having multitude of experience be it new trendy hairstyle, hair spa ,hair cut ,or hair color, Hair experts from Lookplex, we make sure that the spa you receive is the best possible solution to your hair condition. we deliver all hair expertise right at  your home. Get ready to witness the unparalleled salon experience right at your doorstep.</p>
3.serviceDescriptionHeading: Premium hair spa, haircut and hair styles at your doorstep.
